# Oracle SQL Assistant - AWS Bedrock Enhanced Edition
# Environment Configuration Template

# ==============================================
# AWS BEDROCK CONFIGURATION
# ==============================================

# AWS Credentials (required for Bedrock access)
AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=your_aws_access_key_here
AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=bedrock-api-key-
AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=us-east-1
AWS_BEDROCK_REGION=us-east-1

# Alternative: Use AWS IAM Role (recommended for production)
# Leave AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID and AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY empty if using IAM role
# AWS_ROLE_ARN=arn:aws:iam::123456789012:role/YourBedrockRole

# ==============================================
# OPENAI CONFIGURATION (Fallback)
# ==============================================

# OpenAI API Key (for fallback when Bedrock is unavailable)
OPENAI_API_KEY=your_openai_api_key_here

# ==============================================
# PINECONE CONFIGURATION
# ==============================================

# Pinecone API Configuration (for schema retrieval)
PINECONE_API_KEY=your_pinecone_api_key_here
PINECONE_ENVIRONMENT=your_pinecone_environment_here
PINECONE_INDEX_NAME=sqlgen-schema-docs

# ==============================================
# APPLICATION CONFIGURATION
# ==============================================

# Flask Configuration
FLASK_ENV=production
FLASK_DEBUG=False
SECRET_KEY=your_secret_key_here_change_this_in_production

# Application Settings
APP_PORT=7860
APP_HOST=0.0.0.0

# ==============================================
# OPTIONAL CONFIGURATION
# ==============================================

# Model Selection Preferences
DEFAULT_MODEL=claude-sonnet
ENABLE_AUTO_MODEL_SELECTION=true
ENABLE_FALLBACK=true

# Performance Settings
MAX_TOKENS=4000
TEMPERATURE=0.1
TIMEOUT_SECONDS=120

# Logging Configuration
LOG_LEVEL=INFO
ENABLE_DEBUG_LOGGING=false

# ==============================================
# SECURITY CONFIGURATION
# ==============================================

# CORS Settings (if needed)
CORS_ORIGINS=*

# Rate Limiting (optional)
RATE_LIMIT_ENABLED=false
RATE_LIMIT_PER_MINUTE=60

# ==============================================
# DEPLOYMENT CONFIGURATION
# ==============================================

# For Hugging Face Spaces deployment
HF_SPACE_ID=your_huggingface_space_id
HF_TOKEN=your_huggingface_token

# For Docker deployment
DOCKER_BUILD=true
DOCKER_TAG=oracle-sql-bedrock-enhanced

# ==============================================
# MONITORING AND ANALYTICS (Optional)
# ==============================================

# CloudWatch Logs (optional)
CLOUDWATCH_LOG_GROUP=/aws/bedrock/oracle-sql-assistant
CLOUDWATCH_LOG_STREAM=enhanced-edition

# Metrics Collection (optional)
ENABLE_METRICS=true
METRICS_NAMESPACE=OracleSQLAssistant/Enhanced

# ==============================================
# NOTES
# ==============================================

# 1. Copy this file to .env and fill in your actual values
# 2. Never commit .env file to version control
# 3. For production, use AWS IAM roles instead of access keys
# 4. Ensure Bedrock is enabled in your AWS account
# 5. Test your configuration with the /diagnose endpoint
